descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/3096532-1334774739.jpg[/img]

Just before your entry into the story there was a girl who set out to be the best conjurer that ever was or will be.

Her name is Misa, and her first conjure would be the flame Atronach... Her master ( Master Mahou ) sent her out to study Trolls and see if she could summon one.

Her objective completed but at a cost...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Full back story of Misa Jackson is located with her and the spell is located there too.

This spell will allow you to summon a mighty Frost troll to aid you in combat

She wrote her journey down in a diary that she intended to write up for real books

Here is a Fun feature video for my mod by Game Chap :

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JTYXMjaeNMc&context=C4741086ADvjVQa1PpcFOETH6jb1J4CZe_DTN_D7F12yLteN8GjHY=


[spoiler]
Do not look for a person you will fail... Misa is dead and and located near a broken down tree in the undergrowth
[/spoiler]
author: Misa
